8. Conceptualized and assimilated the first ever Media Cell of Spring Fest.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: Spring Fest, popularly known as SF, is the annual social & cultural festival of Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur held during the month of January in the spring semester. As a Core Organizing Team Member of Spring Fest 2015, I was involved in all the three main facets of the fest namely Sponsorship, Publicity and Events. My achievements in these are briefly encompassed in the following:1. Garnered sponsorship worth Rs.2.5 lakhs including alumni contribution and company deals.2. Promoted the fest in the region of Maharashtra (mainly Pune and Nagpur) increasing participation from the area by 100% YoY.3. Led the Guest Hospitality team responsible for the comfortable stay of all the performers (namely Farhan Akhtar Live, Indian Ocean, Euphoria, Paradigm Shift, Spunk and more), judges and company representatives (a total of approx. 500 guests) during the fest.4. Reduced Guest House budget by 20% YoY despite unavailability of rooms due to a co-incidental alumni reunion.5. Prepared the content for the Spring Fest News Agency, the informative leaflet that is distributed to all participants during the Fest.6. Played an instrumental part in conceptualizing and conducting the in-house “Freshers’ Event” which saw a record participation of 700+ freshers.
positions.title: Core Organizing Team Member
positions.description_html:
Spring Fest, popularly known as SF, is the annual social & cultural festival of Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur held during the month of January in the spring semester.
As a Core Organizing Team Member of Spring Fest 2015, I was involved in all the three main facets of the fest namely Sponsorship, Publicity and Events. My achievements in these are briefly encompassed in the following:

1. Garnered sponsorship worth Rs.2.5 lakhs including alumni contribution and company deals.
2. Promoted the fest in the region of Maharashtra (mainly Pune and Nagpur) increasing participation from the area by 100% YoY.
3. Led the Guest Hospitality team responsible for the comfortable stay of all the performers (namely Farhan Akhtar Live, Indian Ocean, Euphoria, Paradigm Shift, Spunk and more), judges and company representatives (a total of approx. 500 guests) during the fest.
4. Reduced Guest House budget by 20% YoY despite unavailability of rooms due to a co-incidental alumni reunion.
5. Prepared the content for the Spring Fest News Agency, the informative leaflet that is distributed to all participants during the Fest.
6. Played an instrumental part in conceptualizing and conducting the in-house “Freshers’ Event” which saw a record participation of 700+ freshers.

experience.title: Product Management and Business Strategy
experience.description: 1. Performed extensive market research to study the feasibility of the product and was instrumental in making beneficial modifications in the product at a nascent stage providing stability and a secure position to enter the industry.2. Used Excel Analytics to study consumer behavior through web traffic information and tagged more than 5000 consumers, thus increasing the company’s data resources by 79 %.3. Conceptualized and strategized a plan & a working model to implement the use of Natural Language Processing (NLP).4. Identified the simple but crucial mathematical cause behind the inability of the scalability of a profitable chat based model (reason for stagnation in growth of chat based service start-ups, viz. GoButler (Europe), Magic (USA), Tathastu (India)).5. Played a crucial role in the formulation of business operation strategies, sub-areas varying from vendor management to customer relations. 6. Developed content for the company Website, Blog and Facebook page and was responsible for all of the social media marketing at the time.7. Thoroughly involved in HR activities, set up the Customer Relations Manager program and recruited and trained the first batch.
experience.description_html: 1. Performed extensive market research to study the feasibility of the product and was instrumental in making beneficial modifications in the product at a nascent stage providing stability and a secure position to enter the industry.2. Used Excel Analytics to study consumer behavior through web traffic information and tagged more than 5000 consumers, thus increasing the company’s data resources by 79 %.3. Conceptualized and strategized a plan & a working model to implement the use of Natural Language Processing (NLP).4. Identified the simple but crucial mathematical cause behind the inability of the scalability of a profitable chat based model (reason for stagnation in growth of chat based service start-ups, viz. GoButler (Europe), Magic (USA), Tathastu (India)).5. Played a crucial role in the formulation of business operation strategies, sub-areas varying from vendor management to customer relations. 6. Developed content for the company Website, Blog and Facebook page and was responsible for all of the social media marketing at the time.7. Thoroughly involved in HR activities, set up the Customer Relations Manager program and recruited and trained the first batch.

experience.title: Socio-Cultural Exchange Student
experience.description: I was a part of two educational programmes, viz. Financial Literacy for Youth (FLY) and SUNSHINE.1. FLY involved teaching advanced mathematical techniques to High School students in Saint Petersburg in order to enable them to understand finance.2. SUNSHINE involved teaching Middle School students with no or little know how of English, to speak in English, through customized interactive programmes. 3. Conducted camps in the countryside to familiarize the younger generation of Russians with different cultures, and equipped them with the knowledge of basic English for day to day use.
experience.description_html: I was a part of two educational programmes, viz. Financial Literacy for Youth (FLY) and SUNSHINE.1. FLY involved teaching advanced mathematical techniques to High School students in Saint Petersburg in order to enable them to understand finance.2. Conducted camps in the countryside to familiarize the younger generation of Russians with different cultures, and equipped them with the knowledge of basic English for day to day use.

Designed a sulfuric acid production plant by designing a novel method incorporating the Pyrite Roasting and Contact processes; with a capacity of 510 tonnes/day.2. Successfully executed the market analysis, economic analysis, and material and energy balances to optimize the process for daily production.3. Completed the mechanical design and process design of a floating head shell and tube heat exchanger, and of a stationary fluidized bed reactor, used in the plant. 4. Used Aspen Plus for flowsheet design, equipment design, and process simulation."}]
